comment.text: This translation key is used for the placeholder text in a form input field where users can enter a URL to upload IdP metadata XML. The text appears as a placeholder in a text input field and helps users understand what information is expected from them.

usage.context:
<div className="upload-input">
 <SsoTextInput
 className="upload-xml-input"
 maxWidth="297px"
 name="uploadXmlUrl"
 placeholder={t("UploadXMLPlaceholder")}
 tabIndex={1}
 value={uploadXmlUrl}
 hasError={!isValidXmlUrl}
 onFocus={onFocus}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and technically complex for the intended context (a UI label). The phrase 'لغة التوصيف الموسعة' (XML) is unnecessary and confusing. It should be simplified for a general user.
The phrase 'بيانات الهوية' is missing a definite article ('ال').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان رابط للبيانات الوصفية لمعرف الهوية (XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP Metadata XML üçün URL' is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would convey the purpose of the URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Metadata XML faylı üçün keçid (URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL към XML с метаданните на доставчика на идентичност" is a bit too literal and verbose. A more natural translation would be something closer to "URL to Identity Provider Metadata XML" or "URL към XML на метаданните на доставчика на самоличност". The current translation includes unnecessary words and phrases that make it less readable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL към XML на метаданните на доставчика на самоличност

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL:sta IdP:n metadata XML' is not a natural or accurate rendering of "URL to IdP Metadata XML" in Finnish. While it contains the correct terms, the structure is awkward.
The translation lacks a clear indicator that this is a URL. Including a label like 'osoite' (address) improves clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding 'osoite' or a similar term to specify it's a URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL դեպի IdP Մետատվյալների XML' is a literal translation and may not be the most natural way to express 'URL to IdP Metadata XML' in Armenian. It sounds somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'IdP մետատվյալների XML-ի URL' or 'XML մետատվյալների URL դեպի IdP' depending on the desired flow and emphasis.  Consulting with a native Armenian speaker experienced in technical terminology is recommended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL a metadati IdP XML' is not idiomatic Italian. 'a' doesn't work well here. A more natural phrasing would be 'URL dei metadati IdP XML' or 'URL per i metadati IdP XML'.

The translation 'IdP metadatu XML vietrādis URL' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'URL to IdP Metadata XML'. While understandable, it's a bit literal and awkward in Latvian. 'Vietrādis' is often used for placeholders in programming contexts, which isn't relevant here. The term 'XML' also sounds a bit out of place directly after 'metadatu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'URL uz IdP metadatu XML failu' or 'IdP metadatu XML faila URL'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL para o XML com os metadados do IdP' is a literal translation but lacks the conciseness and common phrasing of the English source. A more natural Portuguese translation would be 'URL do XML de metadados do IdP' or 'URL para metadados XML do IdP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do XML de metadados do IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Adresa URL la fişierul de metadate XML al furnizorului ID" is a bit verbose and could be simplified. While technically correct, it's not as concise as the English equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL la metadatele XML ale furnizorului ID

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'furnizorului' may be stylistically less preferable in this context.  Consider a slightly more formal phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL la metadatele XML ale furnizorului de identitate

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "URL адрес" is a less natural phrasing in Russian. A more common and preferred term would be "URL". The original English uses 'URL,' which should be preserved in the Russian translation when possible.
The translation 'IdP පාරදත්ත XML වෙත ඒ.ස.නි.' is not an accurate translation of 'URL to IdP Metadata XML'. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.) appears to be an abbreviation and doesn't convey the meaning of 'URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would include the word for 'URL' in Sinhala. For example, 'IdP පාරදත්ත XML හි URL' (IdP Metadata XML's URL) or 'IdP පාරදත්ත XML වෙත ඇති URL' (The URL to IdP Metadata XML).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL-адреса XML-файлу метаданих постачальника посвідчень' is overly literal and could be improved for naturalness in Ukrainian. 'Постачальника посвідчень' is a bit clunky. A more fluent translation would use a term like 'ідентифікатора' or 'сервісу'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса XML-файлу метаданих ідентифікатора (or URL-адреса XML-файлу метаданих сервісу)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'URL-адреса' can be shortened to 'URL' in modern Ukrainian technical documentation, maintaining clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL XML-файлу метаданих ідентифікатора (or URL XML-файлу метаданих сервісу)
